title: Dad Jokes: Halloween Gift Book
description: Over 100 of the Best Halloween JokesHalloween is a time for costumes, trick-or-treating, spooky decorations and Halloween Dad Jokes!!! Ralph Lane, that spooky goblin, has just the Halloween gift for your favorite werewolf, mummy or ghoul-friend. And you know the jokes are going to be hilarious if Ralph picked them. Chapters in this book Ghost JokesGraveyard JokesZombie JokesWitch JokesSkeleton JokesAnd more…The Dad Halloween Gift Book is one of the only illustrated Halloween joke books available on Amazon, and it makes the perfect present for friends, neighbors, dads, moms, kids, grandparents, uncles, aunts, teachers and trick-or-treaters of all ages. It also makes a great birthday gift, get-well gift or Halloween party gift.Ralph Lane is the King of Dad Jokes and no holiday is complete without one of Ralph's hilarious gift books. After purchasing Dad Jokes Halloween Gift Book, don't forget to check out these holiday Dad Christmas Gift BookDad Valentine's Day Gift BookDad St. Patrick's Day Gift BookDad Easter Gift BookDad Gift BookMother's Day Gift Book
author: Ralph Lane
